channel.title: Uhm...Black ops?
channel.description:
Not sure if this is allowed, but anyone want a game of Nazi zombies on black ops (XBOX3 60ONLYTHANKS) We can try out a few glitches etc while we're at it.
PLEASE HAVE A MIC

item.title: Uhm...Black ops?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

It’s a pity you guys are all on the XBOX, wouldn’t of minded doing this myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Uhm...Black ops?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Good game, Primadude, Riku. We got up to round 18 on kino.

Was quite a tense game, we did the run around the map strategy so as you can imagine it was quite a yelling game, We had 3 people, me in the lead (Leading others around map for the first few rounds) we then switched to Riku up front, me in the middle, Jamie at the end. And it stayed like that for most of the game unless there was an emergency and anyone who knew which way to go took the lead.

We ended up dieing through error, I lost my ray gun. Jamie ran out of the ‘thunder gun thing’ ammo. Was just Riku with an upgraded Ray gun. We then got separated at around round 17, I barely made it on my own on one side of the map, while Jamie and Riku tried to survive in the theater room. We’d all exhausted our ammo and separated from each other, I made a last ditch attempt to restart the strategy, which failed. We all ended up dieing where we began, with no ammo. Quite ironic considering you start with fuck all and we died in the same place with fuck all xD

Good game guys

PS sorry about the lack of your decisions, it was just me giving commands and making all the decisions, I felt it best as if we’d had a nice chat about it we’d probably have died. Next time I’m sure we can plan it out more, it was quite a hectic game. It got to a simple

“Prima back, Riku front”

When we where talking to each other

Read full topic

So much xp…

Was just doing that with Riku, great. Especially when you get a chopper gunner o.0

PS: Got up to round 9 on five, damn pentagon thief. First time I experienced him and didn’t know what to do xD

I was pinned in a corner and raped ;([/quote]

Guys, anyone fancy a game of zombies? I’m sure Riku will and myself. Anyone else?
